text: And the men of Israel answered the men of Juda, and said, We have ten 19. 44 Gr. and Heb. hands.parts in the king, and we are older than you, we have also an interest in David above you: and why have ye thus insulted us, and why was not our advice taken before that of Juda, to bring back our king? And the speech of the men of Juda was sharper than the speech of the men of Israel.
